**Identifying Ticket Type**

I'm currently focused on the ticket's text, specifically keywords like "staff changes," "person ID," and "status update date." This suggests an HR-related issue.  I'm trying to determine if other categories are also relevant, or if it solely falls under the "HR Support" umbrella. I'm carefully reviewing the phrases to see if I need to expand my search.


**Defining Ticket Category**

Right now, I'm honing in on the provided phrases. "Staff changes" and "person ID" definitively point to "HR Support". I've ruled out all other ticket categories, confirming "HR Support" is the only option. I've double-checked my work to be certain there isn't more to be found.
